# Installation
> `npm install --save @types/ember-testing-helpers`

# Summary
This package contains type definitions for ember-testing/lib/helpers (https://github.com/emberjs/ember.js/tree/master/packages/ember-testing/lib/helpers).

Files were exported from https://www.github.com/DefinitelyTyped/DefinitelyTyped/tree/master/types/ember-testing-helpers
